executable.title: Otsu Threshold Segmentation
executable.description: This filter creates a binary thresholded image that separates an image into foreground and background components. The filter computes the threshold using the Otsu threshold algorthm, applies that theshold to the input image and runs a connected component algortihm.

integer.name: insideValue
integer.description: The value assigned to pixels that are inside the computed threshold
integer.label: Inside Value

integer.name: outsideValue
integer.description: The value assigned to pixels that are outside the computed threshold
integer.label: Outside Value

integer.name: numberOfBins
integer.description: The number of bins in the histogram
integer.label: Number of Histogram Bins

integer.name: minimumObjectSize
integer.description: Minimum size of object to retain.
integer.label: Minimum Object Size
